00045 RowIntervalScanner::RowIntervalScanner(PropertiesPtr &props_ptr, Comm *comm,
00046                                        TableIdentifier *table_identifier,
00047                                        SchemaPtr &schema_ptr,
00048                                        RangeLocatorPtr &range_locator_ptr,
00049                                        ScanSpec &scan_spec, int timeout)
00050     : m_comm(comm), m_schema_ptr(schema_ptr),
00051       m_range_locator_ptr(range_locator_ptr),
00052       m_range_server(comm, HYPERTABLE_CLIENT_TIMEOUT),
00053       m_table_identifier(*table_identifier), m_started(false),
00054       m_eos(false), m_readahead(true), m_fetch_outstanding(false),
00055       m_end_inclusive(false), m_rows_seen(0), m_timeout(timeout) {
00056 
00057   if (!scan_spec.row_intervals.empty() && !scan_spec.cell_intervals.empty())
00058     HT_THROW(Error::RANGESERVER_BAD_SCAN_SPEC,
00059              "ROW predicates and CELL predicates can't be combined");
00060 
00061   if (m_timeout == 0 ||
00062       (m_timeout = props_ptr->get_int("Hypertable.Client.Timeout", 0)) == 0 ||
00063       (m_timeout = props_ptr->get_int("Hypertable.Request.Timeout", 0)) == 0)
00064     m_timeout = HYPERTABLE_CLIENT_TIMEOUT;
00065 
00066   m_range_locator_ptr->get_location_cache(m_cache_ptr);
00067 
00068   m_range_server.set_default_timeout(m_timeout);
00069 
00070   m_scan_spec_builder.set_row_limit(scan_spec.row_limit);
00071   m_scan_spec_builder.set_max_versions(scan_spec.max_versions);
00072 
00073   for (size_t i=0; i<scan_spec.columns.size(); i++)
00074     m_scan_spec_builder.add_column(scan_spec.columns[i]);
00075 
00076   HT_EXPECT(scan_spec.row_intervals.size() <= 1, Error::FAILED_EXPECTATION);
00077 
00078   if (!scan_spec.row_intervals.empty()) {
00079     if (scan_spec.row_intervals[0].start == 0)
00080       HT_THROW(Error::RANGESERVER_BAD_SCAN_SPEC, "Bad row interval (start == NULL)");
00081     if (scan_spec.row_intervals[0].end == 0)
00082       HT_THROW(Error::RANGESERVER_BAD_SCAN_SPEC, "Bad row interval (end == NULL)");
00083     int cmpval = strcmp(scan_spec.row_intervals[0].start, scan_spec.row_intervals[0].end);
00084     if (cmpval > 0)
00085       HT_THROW(Error::RANGESERVER_BAD_SCAN_SPEC, "start_row > end_row");
00086     if (cmpval == 0 && !scan_spec.row_intervals[0].start_inclusive && !scan_spec.row_intervals[0].end_inclusive)
00087       HT_THROW(Error::RANGESERVER_BAD_SCAN_SPEC, "empty row interval");
00088     m_start_row = scan_spec.row_intervals[0].start;
00089     m_end_row = scan_spec.row_intervals[0].end;
00090     m_end_inclusive = scan_spec.row_intervals[0].end_inclusive;
00091     m_scan_spec_builder.add_row_interval(scan_spec.row_intervals[0].start,
00092                                          scan_spec.row_intervals[0].start_inclusive,
00093                                          scan_spec.row_intervals[0].end,
00094                                          scan_spec.row_intervals[0].end_inclusive);
00095   }
00096   else if (!scan_spec.cell_intervals.empty()) {
00097     if (scan_spec.cell_intervals[0].start_row == 0)
00098       HT_THROW(Error::RANGESERVER_BAD_SCAN_SPEC, "Bad cell interval (start_row == NULL)");
00099     if (scan_spec.cell_intervals[0].start_column == 0)
00100       HT_THROW(Error::RANGESERVER_BAD_SCAN_SPEC, "Bad cell interval (start_column == NULL)");
00101     if (scan_spec.cell_intervals[0].end_row == 0)
00102       HT_THROW(Error::RANGESERVER_BAD_SCAN_SPEC, "Bad cell interval (end_row == NULL)");
00103     if (scan_spec.cell_intervals[0].end_column == 0)
00104       HT_THROW(Error::RANGESERVER_BAD_SCAN_SPEC, "Bad cell interval (end_column == NULL)");
00105     int cmpval = strcmp(scan_spec.cell_intervals[0].start_row, scan_spec.cell_intervals[0].end_row);
00106     if (cmpval > 0)
00107       HT_THROW(Error::RANGESERVER_BAD_SCAN_SPEC, "start_row > end_row");
00108     if (cmpval == 0) {
00109       int cmpval = strcmp(scan_spec.cell_intervals[0].start_column, scan_spec.cell_intervals[0].end_column);
00110       if (cmpval > 0)
00111         HT_THROW(Error::RANGESERVER_BAD_SCAN_SPEC, "start_column > end_column");
00112       if (cmpval == 0 && !scan_spec.cell_intervals[0].start_inclusive && !scan_spec.cell_intervals[0].end_inclusive)
00113         HT_THROW(Error::RANGESERVER_BAD_SCAN_SPEC, "empty cell interval");
00114     }
00115     m_scan_spec_builder.add_cell_interval(scan_spec.cell_intervals[0].start_row,
00116                                           scan_spec.cell_intervals[0].start_column,
00117                                           scan_spec.cell_intervals[0].start_inclusive,
00118                                           scan_spec.cell_intervals[0].end_row,
00119                                           scan_spec.cell_intervals[0].end_column,
00120                                           scan_spec.cell_intervals[0].end_inclusive);
00121     m_start_row = scan_spec.cell_intervals[0].start_row;
00122     m_end_row = scan_spec.cell_intervals[0].end_row;
00123     m_end_inclusive = true;
00124   }
00125   else {
00126     m_start_row = "";
00127     m_end_row = Key::END_ROW_MARKER;
00128     m_scan_spec_builder.add_row_interval("", false, Key::END_ROW_MARKER, false);
00129   }
00130 
00131   if (m_scan_spec_builder.get().row_limit == 1 ||
00132       (scan_spec.row_intervals.size() == 1 &&
00133        (scan_spec.row_intervals[0].start && scan_spec.row_intervals[0].end) &&
00134        !strcmp(scan_spec.row_intervals[0].start, scan_spec.row_intervals[0].end)))
00135     m_readahead = false;
00136 
00137   m_scan_spec_builder.set_time_interval(scan_spec.time_interval.first,
00138                                         scan_spec.time_interval.second);
00139 
00140   m_scan_spec_builder.set_return_deletes(scan_spec.return_deletes);
00141 
00142 }

00148 RowIntervalScanner::~RowIntervalScanner() {
00149 
00150   // if there is an outstanding fetch, wait for it to come back or timeout
00151   if (m_fetch_outstanding)
00152     m_sync_handler.wait_for_reply(m_event_ptr);
00153 }

00156 
00157 bool RowIntervalScanner::next(Cell &cell) {
00158   int error;
00159   ByteString bskey, value;
00160   Key key;
00161   Timer timer(m_timeout);
00162 
00163   if (m_eos)
00164     return false;
00165 
00166   if (!m_started)
00167     find_range_and_start_scan(m_start_row.c_str(), timer);
00168 
00169   while (!m_scanblock.more()) {
00170     if (m_scanblock.eos()) {
00171       if (!strcmp(m_range_info.end_row.c_str(), Key::END_ROW_MARKER) ||
00172           m_end_row.compare(m_range_info.end_row) <= 0) {
00173         m_range_server.destroy_scanner(m_cur_addr, m_scanblock.get_scanner_id(), 0);
00174         m_eos = true;
00175         return false;
00176       }
00177       String next_row = m_range_info.end_row;
00178       next_row.append(1,1);  // construct row key in next range
00179       find_range_and_start_scan(next_row.c_str(), timer);
00180     }
00181     else {
00182       if (m_fetch_outstanding) {
00183         if (!m_sync_handler.wait_for_reply(m_event_ptr)) {
00184           m_fetch_outstanding = false;
00185           HT_ERRORF("RangeServer 'fetch scanblock' error : %s", Protocol::string_format_message(m_event_ptr).c_str());
00186           HT_THROW((int)Protocol::response_code(m_event_ptr), "");
00187         }
00188         else {
00189           error = m_scanblock.load(m_event_ptr);
00190           if (m_readahead && !m_scanblock.eos()) {
00191             m_range_server.fetch_scanblock(m_cur_addr, m_scanblock.get_scanner_id(), &m_sync_handler);
00192             m_fetch_outstanding = true;
00193           }
00194           else
00195             m_fetch_outstanding = false;
00196         }
00197       }
00198       else {
00199         timer.start();
00200         m_range_server.set_timeout((time_t)(timer.remaining() + 0.5));
00201         m_range_server.fetch_scanblock(m_cur_addr, m_scanblock.get_scanner_id(), m_scanblock);
00202       }
00203 
00204     }
00205   }
00206 
00207   if (m_scanblock.next(bskey, value)) {
00208     Schema::ColumnFamily *cf;
00209     if (!key.load(bskey))
00210       HT_THROW(Error::BAD_KEY, "");
00211 
00212     // check for end row
00213 
00214     if (!strcmp(key.row, Key::END_ROW_MARKER)) {
00215       m_range_server.destroy_scanner(m_cur_addr, m_scanblock.get_scanner_id(), 0);
00216       m_eos = true;
00217       return false;
00218     }
00219 
00220     if (m_end_inclusive) {
00221       if (strcmp(key.row, m_end_row.c_str()) > 0) {
00222         m_range_server.destroy_scanner(m_cur_addr, m_scanblock.get_scanner_id(), 0);
00223         m_eos = true;
00224         return false;
00225       }
00226     }
00227     else {
00228       if (strcmp(key.row, m_end_row.c_str()) >= 0) {
00229         m_range_server.destroy_scanner(m_cur_addr, m_scanblock.get_scanner_id(), 0);
00230         m_eos = true;
00231         return false;
00232       }
00233     }
00234 
00235     // check for row change and row limit
00236     if (strcmp(m_cur_row.c_str(), key.row)) {
00237       m_rows_seen++;
00238       m_cur_row = key.row;
00239       if (m_scan_spec_builder.get().row_limit > 0 && m_rows_seen > m_scan_spec_builder.get().row_limit) {
00240         m_range_server.destroy_scanner(m_cur_addr, m_scanblock.get_scanner_id(), 0);
00241         m_eos = true;
00242         return false;
00243       }
00244     }
00245 
00246     cell.row_key = key.row;
00247     cell.column_qualifier = key.column_qualifier;
00248     if ((cf = m_schema_ptr->get_column_family(key.column_family_code)) == 0) {
00249       // LOG ERROR ...
00250       //HT_THROW(Error::BAD_KEY, "");
00251       cell.column_family = 0;
00252     }
00253     else
00254       cell.column_family = cf->name.c_str();
00255     cell.timestamp = key.timestamp;
00256     cell.value_len = value.decode_length(&cell.value);
00257     cell.flag = key.flag;
00258     return true;
00259   }
00260 
00261   HT_ERROR("No end marker found at end of table.");
00262 
00263   m_range_server.destroy_scanner(m_cur_addr, m_scanblock.get_scanner_id(), 0);
00264   m_eos = true;
00265   return false;
00266 }

00269 
00270 void RowIntervalScanner::find_range_and_start_scan(const char *row_key, Timer &timer) {
00271   RangeSpec  range;
00272   DynamicBuffer dbuf(0);
00273 
00274   timer.start();
00275 
00276  try_again:
00277 
00278   try {
00279     if (!m_cache_ptr->lookup(m_table_identifier.id, row_key, &m_range_info))
00280       m_range_locator_ptr->find_loop(&m_table_identifier, row_key, &m_range_info, timer, false);
00281   }
00282   catch (Exception &e) {
00283     if (e.code() == Error::REQUEST_TIMEOUT)
00284       HT_THROW2(e.code(), e, e.what());
00285     poll(0, 0, 1000);
00286     if (timer.expired())
00287       HT_THROW(Error::REQUEST_TIMEOUT, "");
00288     goto try_again;
00289   }
00290 
00291   m_started = true;
00292 
00293   dbuf.ensure(m_range_info.start_row.length() + m_range_info.end_row.length() + 2);
00294   range.start_row = (const char *)dbuf.add_unchecked(m_range_info.start_row.c_str(), m_range_info.start_row.length()+1);
00295   range.end_row   = (const char *)dbuf.add_unchecked(m_range_info.end_row.c_str(), m_range_info.end_row.length()+1);
00296   if (!LocationCache::location_to_addr(m_range_info.location.c_str(), m_cur_addr)) {
00297     HT_ERRORF("Invalid location found in METADATA entry range [%s..%s] - %s",
00298                  range.start_row, range.end_row, m_range_info.location.c_str());
00299     HT_THROW(Error::INVALID_METADATA, "");
00300   }
00301 
00302   try {
00303     m_range_server.set_timeout((time_t)(timer.remaining() + 0.5));
00304     m_range_server.create_scanner(m_cur_addr, m_table_identifier, range, m_scan_spec_builder.get(), m_scanblock);
00305   }
00306   catch (Exception &e) {
00307 
00308     // try again, the hard way
00309     m_range_locator_ptr->find_loop(&m_table_identifier, row_key, &m_range_info, timer, true);
00310 
00311     // reset the range information
00312     dbuf.ensure(m_range_info.start_row.length() + m_range_info.end_row.length() + 2);
00313     range.start_row = (const char *)dbuf.add_unchecked(m_range_info.start_row.c_str(), m_range_info.start_row.length()+1);
00314     range.end_row   = (const char *)dbuf.add_unchecked(m_range_info.end_row.c_str(), m_range_info.end_row.length()+1);
00315     if (!LocationCache::location_to_addr(m_range_info.location.c_str(), m_cur_addr)) {
00316       HT_ERRORF("Invalid location found in METADATA entry range [%s..%s] - %s",
00317                    range.start_row, range.end_row, m_range_info.location.c_str());
00318       HT_THROW(Error::INVALID_METADATA, "");
00319     }
00320 
00321     // create the scanner
00322     try {
00323       m_range_server.set_timeout((time_t)(timer.remaining() + 0.5));
00324       m_range_server.create_scanner(m_cur_addr, m_table_identifier, range, m_scan_spec_builder.get(), m_scanblock);
00325     }
00326     catch (Exception &e) {
00327       HT_ERRORF("%s - %s", e.what(), Error::get_text(e.code()));
00328       HT_THROW(e.code(), String("Problem creating scanner on ") + m_table_identifier.name + "[" + range.start_row + ".." + range.end_row + "]");
00329     }
00330   }
00331 
00332   // maybe kick off readahead
00333   if (m_readahead && !m_scanblock.eos()) {
00334     m_range_server.fetch_scanblock(m_cur_addr, m_scanblock.get_scanner_id(), &m_sync_handler);
00335     m_fetch_outstanding = true;
00336   }
00337   else
00338     m_fetch_outstanding = false;
00339 }
